instructions_to_main_agent.general: Follow the E1 'Anti-AI' philosophy. Avoid generic layouts. Use the 'Electric Tangerine' orange boldly but strategically (CTAs, active states).
instructions_to_main_agent.layout: Use the Bento Grid for the job board. Don't just list rows. Make the 'Featured' jobs bigger.
instructions_to_main_agent.components: Customize Shadcn components. Don't use the default radius. Use 'rounded-xl' or 'rounded-2xl' for a friendlier vibe. Use the 'Outfit' font for all headings.
instructions_to_main_agent.dark_mode: Ensure high contrast in dark mode. Use 'Obsidian' (#0A0A0A) background, not pure black. Borders should be subtle (white/10).
instructions_to_main_agent.testing: Add data-testid to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, cards).

do_not: Use purple or teal for CTAs
